title: Never going to White Castle again
body:
The White Castle near me is now selling "Impossible Sliders" meaning the patties are plant based, no meat. Ironically, the burger comes with cheese which doesn't make sense if you're eating a burger without animal products.

So I go in, I order 3 and ask for **NO cheese**. I said it twice, the cashier told the dude at the grill "no cheese, you hear?" Guess what I got? Three sliders **WITH cheese**. 

Only reason I didn't take it back was because it looked like their manager was rushing them to do something by 11, so I didn't want to give them more work. Still, you'll never catch me  in there again

{{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}
